actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

official_title: To amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to authorize reimbursement of certain expenditures by operators of privately owned reliever airports.

summary.text: Amends the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to reimburse an owner or operator of a privately owned reliever airport for costs, including construction costs, incurred for an airport development project before entry into an airport development grant agreement under the Act.

titles.title: To amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to authorize reimbursement of certain expenditures by operators of privately owned reliever airports.
